attributes.action: Support and implement The Minister Observation Pool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been looking at the 10 Downing Street site with some interest and Politics will and has always been a stand off point when Public opinion is involved, where is our freedom of speech as the voter. If the Government truly value the British Voter they should have Ministers highlight on the news a segment that discusses topic’s from this petition e-Community, or by Pod Cast on the PM’s site on a monthly basis giving regard to the originator to validate the e-Petitioner. Voting these days has a low turn out because the Community feel undermined, using the e-Petition system as a continued sense of worth and acting on them will in fact create a valued potential voter. Make our vote count and let us have our say!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
